review: First off.  It works great.  Easiest device set up I have ever seen.  You plug it in and it shows you a how to video and you're done.  Even your account is already set up.  It's very fast, and I had a lot less lag then when I was using chrome cast.My one grip, is that the voice search ( which works REALLY well ) only searches amazon.  Xbox 360 has this same kind of functionality but it searches not only the microsoft digital movie store, but netflix, hulu, and whatever other services are available.I understand they want this to be a cash register for the store, but this is not a free device and amazon is not where ANYONE that I know primarily watches content.

review: We have used this almost exclusively since we bought it. It has a ton of ways to enjoy so many movies an shows. We also love how portable it is. We travel frequently between two homes in two different states and take this with us so we don't have to keep our satellite or cable TV service active when we are not always there to use it.
